summary: Provides an automatic fallback system for CuPy that redirects operations lacking GPU support to equivalent NumPy functions, using proxy objects, conversion utilities, and wrapper types that emulate CuPy's ndarray and vectorize interfaces, along with a notification component that issues warnings when fallback occurs.
business_intent: Enable seamless execution of CuPy-based code on environments without full GPU support by transparently switching to CPUâ€‘based NumPy implementations, thereby enhancing compatibility and reducing runtime errors.
